sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-button @click="handleClick" id="highlighterBarBtn" type="default" title="打开笔记工具">
    <svg
      t="1649236621045"
      class="icon"
      viewBox="0 0 1024 1024"
      version="1.1"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      p-id="2897"
      width="100%"
      height="100%"
    >
      <path
        d="M957.6 507.4L603.2 158.2c-3.1-3.1-8.1-3.1-11.2 0L353.3 393.4c-3.1 3.1-3.2 8.2-0.1 11.3l0.1 0.1 40 39.4-117.2 115.3c-3.1 3.1-3.2 8.2-0.1 11.3l0.1 0.1 39.5 38.9-189.1 187H72.1c-4.4 0-8.1 3.6-8.1 8V860c0 4.4 3.6 8 8 8h344.9c2.1 0 4.1-0.8 5.6-2.3l76.1-75.6 40.4 39.8c3.1 3.1 8.1 3.1 11.2 0l117.1-115.6 40.1 39.5c3.1 3.1 8.1 3.1 11.2 0l238.7-235.2c3.4-3 3.4-8 0.3-11.2zM389.8 796.2H229.6l134.4-133 80.1 78.9-54.3 54.1z m154.8-62.1L373.2 565.2l68.6-67.6 171.4 168.9-68.6 67.6zM713.1 658L450.3 399.1 597.6 254l262.8 259-147.3 145z"
        p-id="2898"
      ></path>
    </svg>
  </a-button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'HighlighterButton',
  props: ['highlighterBarIsVisible'],
  data() {
    return {
      toggle: true,
    }
  },
  watch: {
    highlighterBarIsVisible: {
      handler(newVal) {
        this.toggle = !newVal
      },
      immediate: true,
    },
  },
  methods: {
    handleClick() {
      this.$emit('changeHighlighterBarVisible', this.toggle)
      this.toggle = !this.toggle
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style>
#highlighterBarBtn {
  position: absolute;
  right: 100px;
  bottom: 100px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  box-shadow: 0 3px 6px -4px #0000001f, 0 6px 16px #00000014, 0 9px 28px 8px #0000000d;
}
</style>
